title: CoFoundrAI — AI Startup Co-Founder Platform Frontend

requirements.text: Create a global API service module at frontend/src/services/api.ts that configures Axios with base URL http://127.0.0.1:8000. Export typed async functions for: postAnalyze(idea: string), postSimulate(analyzeData), postImage(idea: string), postReport(analyzeData), postLinkedIn(analyzeData), postAutopost(linkedinPost: string), and getMcpMetrics(). All functions must handle errors gracefully and return typed response data.

quotes: Frontend must FULLY CONNECT to an existing FastAPI backend

acceptanceCriteria: Axios instance is configured with baseURL http://127.0.0.1:8000
All 7 API functions are exported and typed
Network errors surface as caught exceptions with error messages

requirements.text: Create a global state management solution (React Context or Zustand store) in frontend/src/hooks/useCoFoundrStore.ts that persists: ideaText, analyzeResult, simulateResult, brochureImageUrl, reportBlob, linkedinPost, mcpMetrics, and per-step loading/error states. All workflow pages must read from and write to this shared state so results from /analyze are reused in subsequent steps without re-fetching.
acceptanceCriteria: analyzeResult persists across page/tab navigation within the app
Steps 2–6 consume analyzeResult from global state without re-calling /analyze
Each step exposes an independent loading boolean and error string

requirements.text: Build a Landing Page at frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx featuring: a full-viewport 3D hero section with a Three.js / React Three Fiber animated particle or geometric background, the CoFoundrAI logo/brand name rendered in large gradient typography, a concise AI startup value-proposition tagline, and a prominent 'Analyze Your Idea' CTA button that navigates to the Dashboard page.
acceptanceCriteria: Three.js animated background renders without errors on the landing page
CTA button navigates to /dashboard
Page is fully responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop

requirements.text: Build a persistent sidebar navigation component at frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx with links to: Dashboard, Simulation, Brochure, Report, LinkedIn, Auto-Post, and Metrics. Show the active route highlighted. Include the CoFoundrAI logo at the top. The sidebar collapses to an icon-only rail on smaller screens. Apply glassmorphism styling (frosted glass background, subtle border, backdrop blur).
acceptanceCriteria: All 7 navigation destinations are present and functional
Active route is visually distinct
Sidebar collapses on mobile
Glassmorphism styles are applied

requirements.text: Build a Workflow Progress Tracker component at frontend/src/components/WorkflowTracker.tsx that displays all 7 steps (Analyze, Simulate, Brochure, Report, LinkedIn, Auto-Post, Metrics) as a horizontal stepper or vertical timeline. Each step shows: idle, in-progress (animated spinner), completed (checkmark), or error (red indicator) states sourced from global state. Animate step transitions with smooth transitions.
acceptanceCriteria: All 7 steps are visible simultaneously
Step states update reactively as API calls complete
Animated transitions between idle → loading → done/error

requirements.text: Build the Dashboard page at frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx containing: a multiline textarea for startup idea input bound to global ideaText, an 'Analyze' button that calls POST /analyze and stores the result in global state, a full-page loading overlay with animated AI-themed spinner during the call, and an Agent Results Panel that displays the response fields: Business Analysis, Market Analysis, Tech Feasibility, Risk Analysis, and Validation Score — each in its own glassmorphism card with animated entrance.
acceptanceCriteria: POST /analyze is called with { idea: ideaText }
All 5 result fields render in separate cards
Loading overlay is visible during API call
Error toast appears if the request fails

requirements.text: Build a Simulation page at frontend/src/pages/SimulationPage.tsx. On page load (if analyzeResult exists), call POST /simulate with the analyzeResult payload. Display the response using Recharts or Chart.js charts: a line chart for market growth over time, a gauge or bar chart for success probability, and summary metric cards. Show a loading state during the call.
acceptanceCriteria: Charts render correctly with data from /simulate response
If analyzeResult is missing, show a prompt directing the user to run analysis first
Loading spinner visible while /simulate is pending

requirements.text: Build a Brochure page at frontend/src/pages/BrochurePage.tsx. Provide a 'Generate Brochure' button that calls POST /image with { idea: ideaText }. Display the returned image URL or base64 image dynamically in a styled preview card with a download link. Show a loading animation during generation.
acceptanceCriteria: Image is rendered from the API response without page reload
Download link allows saving the image
Loading animation is shown during the API call

requirements.text: Build a Report page at frontend/src/pages/ReportPage.tsx. Provide a 'Generate Report' button that calls POST /report with the analyzeResult. On success: show a Download PDF button that triggers browser file download of the returned binary, and a 'Preview' button that opens a modal displaying the PDF inline using an iframe or PDF viewer. Show loading and error states.
acceptanceCriteria: Download button triggers file save of the PDF blob
Preview modal renders the PDF inline
Error toast shown if /report fails

requirements.text: Build a LinkedIn page at frontend/src/pages/LinkedInPage.tsx. Provide a 'Generate Post' button that calls POST /linkedin with the analyzeResult and populates an editable textarea with the returned post text stored in global state. Below it, provide a 'Auto-Post to LinkedIn' button that calls POST /autopost with the current textarea content and shows a success toast notification on completion.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated text pre-fills editable textarea
User can edit the post before auto-posting
Success toast appears after /autopost completes
Error toast appears if either call fails

requirements.text: Build a Metrics page at frontend/src/pages/MetricsPage.tsx. On mount, call GET /mcp/metrics and display the response in a dashboard grid showing: Agent Executions count, System Performance indicators, and Request Counts — each in a styled stat card. Include a manual Refresh button. Auto-refresh every 30 seconds.
acceptanceCriteria: Metrics cards display values from /mcp/metrics response
Auto-refresh fires every 30 seconds
Manual refresh button triggers immediate refetch

requirements.text: Build a global Toast notification system at frontend/src/components/ToastProvider.tsx. Expose a useToast hook for triggering success (green), error (red), and info (blue) toasts from anywhere in the app. Toasts must auto-dismiss after 4 seconds and support manual dismissal. Position them at the top-right corner.
acceptanceCriteria: Success and error toasts are visually distinct
Toasts auto-dismiss after 4 seconds
Multiple toasts stack correctly

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive premium dark SaaS visual theme across all pages and components: deep dark background (#0a0a0f base), frosted-glass cards (backdrop-blur + rgba fill + 1px border with subtle glow), gradient accent colors (cyan-to-violet), futuristic sans-serif typography, soft neumorphic shadows on interactive elements, and animated gradient lighting blobs in the background. Floating AI agent cards should have 3D depth on hover (CSS transform translateZ / perspective). Use smooth Framer Motion transitions for all page entrances, card appearances, and loading states.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages use the dark base background
Glassmorphism cards have backdrop-blur and semi-transparent fill
Hover states on cards show perceptible 3D depth transform
Framer Motion entrance animations fire on page/component mount
Theme is consistent across Landing, Dashboard, and all workflow pages

constraints: All API calls must target http://127.0.0.1:8000 — do not change backend endpoints or payloads
Do not reload the page at any point in the workflow — use client-side navigation only
Backend Motoko canister is not used — all data flows through the FastAPI backend at the specified base URL
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Building or modifying the FastAPI backend
Persisting data in the Motoko backend canister

required: Futuristic AI brain / neural network logo mark on a transparent background, cyan-to-violet gradient lines, minimal and geometric (cofoundrai-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Abstract dark space-like hero background with glowing particle network and subtle cyan-violet gradient nebula (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
